projects.title: e-Verify Certification Portal
projects.description: The EntwicklersX Certificate Verification Portal is a platform designed to host and verify certificates issued by EntwicklersX. It provides a secure and easy way for individuals and organizations to verify the authenticity of certificates. The portal streamlines the verification process, ensuring fast and accurate results.

projects.title: Tittuji
projects.description: Tittuji is a telegram bot which sends the received messages from telegram to the user's email address. It is a simple bot which can be used to send messages from telegram to email.
